Config Exec¶

Module responsible for running all analysis steps

class config_exec.ConfigExec(Config)¶

Object resposible for execute properly run tools provided in Config files

Get list of tulpes with corresponding paired-end files

Parameters

Returns

grouped_files - tulpes list with grouped files

list

prepare_files_to_counting(input_files_list, output_dir)¶

Converts sam files to bam and sort bam files
